article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Xe0JtI hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: PLAYED OUT IN EIGHT HANDS OF CARDS

h2.a: Crooks Spy On Casino Card Games With Hacked Security Cameras, Win $33M

div.p: A high-roller and hacker accomplices made off with about $33 million after they gamed a casino in Australia by hacking its surveillance cameras and gaining an advantage in several rounds of high-stakes card games.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xe0JtI&via=Digg&text=Crooks Spy On Casino Card Games With Hacked Security Cameras, Win $33M

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZzAL4d hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Is This The World's Smallest Book?

div.p: Japanese book of flowers called Shiki no Kusabana, with pages only 0.75 millimetres, is hoping for title of the world's smallest printed book.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZzAL4d&via=Digg&text=Is This The World's Smallest Book?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XfXIsV hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: This Guy Took Out A Gigantic Loan To Destroy The Financial System

div.p: In 2008, anti-capitalist campaigner Enric Durán borrowed $642,306 from 39 different financial entities with absolutely no hope or intention of paying it back.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XfXIsV&via=Digg&text=This Guy Took Out A Gigantic Loan To Destroy The Financial System

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-157aP32 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Brewery To Recreate 200-Year-Old Shipwrecked Beer

div.p: Bottles of found beer were still drinkable after being preserved by cool temperatures, pressure from the sea, and total darkness.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/157aP32&via=Digg&text=Brewery To Recreate 200-Year-Old Shipwrecked Beer

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Zftbhr hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: IT KNOWS YOU JUST READ THAT

h2.a: The Internet Is A Surveillance State

div.p: Whether we like it or not, we're being tracked all the time on the Internet.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Zftbhr&via=Digg&text=The Internet Is A Surveillance State

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YhfLiG hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: YOUR FOOD IS OUT TO GET YOU

h2.a: Be Afraid Of Your Food

div.p: Vegetables are as dangerous as meat, why you should wash your hands constantly, and the problem with restaurant eggs. It’s all enough to make you never eat again after reading this interview with epidemiologist Patricia Kludt.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YhfLiG&via=Digg&text=Be Afraid Of Your Food

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Xg4izK hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Google Killed Off The Reader In Self Defense

div.p: Though Google Reader addicts are in mourning, they should have seen it coming. It’s not the kind of product that makes sense for Google in the longer run.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xg4izK&via=Digg&text=Google Killed Off The Reader In Self Defense

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Yd5GGI hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Hear The Stories Behind Iconic Images Of The Iraq Conflict

div.p: They were the images that defined the conflict in Iraq: the pain of ordinary Iraqi civilians, the exhaustion of American soldiers. But what became of them? From Fort Polk, Louisiana, USA, to Tal Afar, northern Iraq, Guardian reporters track down the people behind the images and hear their moving stories.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Yd5GGI&via=Digg&text=Hear The Stories Behind Iconic Images Of The Iraq Conflict

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZYwXNG hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: 'After Ever After' Disney Princesses Parody Goes Viral

div.p: Ever wondered what really happens in the "ever after" to those Disney princesses whom we are told "lived happily ever after"? Jon Cozart's "After Ever After" viral video parody of Disney reveals the after-curtain-falls lives of the princesses.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZYwXNG&via=Digg&text='After Ever After' Disney Princesses Parody Goes Viral

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-15aqGxE hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Secret To Carnival Cruise's Business Model? Free Coast Guard Rescues

div.p: One reason the company recovered so easily from its recent disasters is that cruise vacationers have proven to be a forgetful lot—and expedient

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15aqGxE&via=Digg&text=Secret To Carnival Cruise's Business Model? Free Coast Guard Rescues

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YgN6KI hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: How Beer Gave Us Civilization

div.p: Luckily, from time to time, our ancestors, like other animals, would run across fermented fruit or grain and sample it. How this accidental discovery evolved into the first keg party, of course, is still unknown. But evolve it did, perhaps as early as 10,000 years ago.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YgN6KI&via=Digg&text=How Beer Gave Us Civilization

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-13ZHZFq hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Thieves Steal Entire Bridge, The Whole Bridge, For Scrap Metal

div.p: The days of casually crossing a creek are over if you live in the Gölçük district of Kocaeli province in western Turkey.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13ZHZFq&via=Digg&text=Thieves Steal Entire Bridge, The Whole Bridge, For Scrap Metal

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XK6wxf hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: IRON LIKE A LION IN COMPTON

h2.a: Snoop Dogg's Mid-Life Crisis

div.p: The hip-hop star's 'Reincarnation' documentary about his revelatory Jamaica trip is out, with the reggae album set for April. He says the change is legit.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XK6wxf&via=Digg&text=Snoop Dogg's Mid-Life Crisis

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YvVLrC hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: The Plan To Bring The Iconic Passenger Pigeon Back From Extinction

div.p: About 1,500 passenger pigeons inhabit museum collections. They are all that’s left of a species once perceived as a limitless resource. The birds were shipped in boxcars by the tons, sold as meat for 31 cents per dozen, and plucked for mattress feathers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YvVLrC&via=Digg&text=The Plan To Bring The Iconic Passenger Pigeon Back From Extinction

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-13Y8rPX hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Matthew Keys' Attorney: He Was 'Undercover'

div.p: Matthew Keys, the Reuters deputy social media editor charged with helping Anonymous attack the website of his former employer, acted as an “undercover" journalist when he communicated with members of the hacker group, his attorneys told The Huffington Post Friday.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13Y8rPX&via=Digg&text=Matthew Keys' Attorney: He Was 'Undercover'

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZFOK8E hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: WHEN WILL WE DISCOVER THE WINO?

h2.a: Beyond The Higgs Boson: Five More Elusive Particles

div.p: The discovery of the Higgs boson greatly furthers our understanding of the fundamental constituents of matter, but some subatomic puzzle pieces still remain. Here are five types of bizarre particles that could turn up in atom-smashing experiments.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZFOK8E&via=Digg&text=Beyond The Higgs Boson: Five More Elusive Particles

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YuyucV hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Why I Love RSS And You Do Too

div.p: One way or another, directly or indirectly, you use RSS. Without RSS all we’d have is pictures of cats and breakfast.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YuyucV&via=Digg&text=Why I Love RSS And You Do Too

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YieQyA hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Watch These Real-Life Supermen Wingsuit Dive Into Their Metropolis

div.p: When you go sky-diving, there's that all-important business of making sure you don't slam into the ground, but you also have to make sure you don't slam into anything protruding out of it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YieQyA&via=Digg&text=Watch These Real-Life Supermen Wingsuit Dive Into Their Metropolis

div.p: There are people on the internet claiming to offer contract killing services for hire.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZVPg64 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Hackers Sent A SWAT Team To My House

div.p: It’s not often that one has the opportunity to be the target of a cyber and kinetic attack at the same time. But that is exactly what’s happened to me and my Web site over the past 24 hours.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZVPg64&via=Digg&text=Hackers Sent A SWAT Team To My House

div.p: No snakes. No shamrocks. Just the facts.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XQjOWO hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Behind Bars With Gaddafi's Would-Be Assassin

div.p: Twenty-six years ago, Azeddine Madani would have done anything to escape his cell in Tripoli's notorious Abu Salim prison, but right now he’s wrangling with armed guards in an effort to get back in.
